name: Luminescence
description: "Let's make a deal, if you can prove that urban legend is a lie, I won't bother you anymore." Rena is annoying student. She always show up wherever Ady is. Until one day, they make a deal. If Ady can prove that urban legend is a lie, she promise to leave Ady alone. Can Ady prove it ?
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space
